events.event_details: Residents will show off their decorating skills for a chance to win gift cards to places that will remain unnamed until the contest. There will be THREE winners, but only 24 people are allowed to participate in the event. A sign-up sheet will be sent to you in a following email. Hope to see you there!
Come enjoy some food and Jackbox games with your Hawthorn Leadership teams! No signup required just come and have some fun!

We have fruits from around the world, some you have never even heard of! Come down and try some fruits, we also have a blender in case you decide to make a SMOOTHIE with these amazing fruits! I hope to see you there!
